For six years, I have been playing day and night in my old national team uniform, but now I am playing for nothing?
In the past 6 years, updates have been slow, and I have been sticking to playing until the second generation becomes popular. I stopped playing after just two seasons, and later I said I've been playing for a few years, but PVE still hasn't come out yet
The props in the game are as expensive as Activision, but Activision updates quickly and slowly
This is the first buyout game I paid for, and it is also the most expensive game to date
You cannot inherit data from the national server and cannot play it again because it is not fun. Just toss it around. If you haven't played data from the national server for such a long time, you won't be tired of playing it
Anyway, FKY ATVI

I pre-ordered [b]Overwatch 2[/b] for the promises of PvE content and that is only selling point for [b]Overwatch 2[/b] but they cancelled the PvE content for some incompetent reasons and within the [u]cancellation[/u] say they had the audacity to announce separate PvE stories/bundles that we need to buy again. At least have the decency to give the first bundle of PvE content for free for the people like me who bought the actual game but nope we have to [u]buy it again[/u].

[b]If you are wondering what is keeping this game alive is not the actual game it is the [i]porn[/i].[/b]

[list]  [h1]Positives [/h1]
    [*] Porn
[/list]
[list]  [h1]Negatives [/h1]
    [*] Badly balanced
    [*] Expensive store ( skins )
    [*] The developers really do not care about the state of the game.
[/list]

彼漾的晚意 初升的东曦，彼阳的晚意 必扬的父母，堂世的孩子   
天天鹿罐都这么优秀，在这个充满活力的年纪，堂世的孩子，考迪克，一天天在成长。他的每一天都充满了挑战和惊喜，就像那初升的东曦🥰🥰🥰，带给人们希望和光明🤩🤩🤩。他的优秀不仅体现在学业上，更体现在他的性格和品质上。考迪克，这个充满活力的少年，他的成长过程中充满了挫折与挑战。然而，他总是能以积极的态度面对困难，就像那挺立的大树，无论风吹雨打，始终坚韧不拔。他的坚持和毅力，让父母为他骄傲，也让朋友们对他佩服不已。在校园里，考迪克是那个被众人瞩目的焦点。他不仅成绩优秀，更是那颗璀璨的荔枝，他的独特个性吸引了众人的目光。他总是能带给大家惊喜，无论是他的创新思维，还是他的活跃表现。他就像那盛开的莲花，始终保持着自己的独特魅力。在家里，考迪克是那个懂事的大男孩。他懂得每天不仅完成自己的学业，还会帮助父母分担家务。他的成熟和体贴，让父母感到无比的欣慰。他是父母的希望，是他们的骄傲。考迪克的成长过程，就像那彼漾的晚意，又如同那初升的东曦。他的每一天都充满了希望和活力。他的青春充满了色彩，充满了希望。考迪克的故事告诉我们，每一个人都有自己的独特魅力，只要我们勇敢地展现自己，就能像考迪克一样，成为那挺立的大树，成为那璀璨的荔枝，成为那初升的东曦。无论我们面对什么困难，只要我们有决心有毅力有信心，我们就能像考迪克一样，成为那令人赞叹的青春少年！
谢谢那个夏天带给我的惊喜和欢乐，但是回不去了。还有司马暴雪还我国服

[h1] Overwatch 1 > Overwatch 2 [/h1]

I've been playing this game since 2018, and these days were really fun. The state of [b] Overwatch 2 [/b] now is truly disappointing. The gameplay changes and updates seem to have eroded the essence that initially drew players in, and the developers' decisions have left many long-time fans feeling alienated and frustrated. And yeah, they are selling the original free-to-play PvE mode in [b]Overwatch 2[/b], which is really disappointing for old players and shows how [b] Blizzard [/b] is greedy and doesn't care about their loyal fans. [b] Overwatch [/b] became disappointing, especially after the departure of [b] Jeff Kaplan [/b] and [b] Michael Chu [/b] from the team. What's most troubling is the lack of transparency and communication from the current development team. The decisions made feel detached from the concerns and preferences of the player community, leaving many of us who were once loyal and enthusiastic fans feeling alienated and let down. [b]Overwatch 2[/b]'s journey from a promising concept to a disappointment is disheartening for those of us who believed in its potential. It's sad to see the game we once loved and enjoyed transform into something that feels disconnected from its roots and its player base.
